abstract: Sarah Khan travel article on visit to Hyderabad, India; notes little remains of the glorious past her father and grandparents once knew.
lead_paragraph: In an Indian city, little remains of the glorious past a father told stories about.
snippet: In an Indian city, little remains of the glorious past a father told stories about.

headline.main: Returning to Hyderabad, Once a Land of Princes and Palaces
headline.print_headline: Once a Land of Princes and Palaces
